targets.alias: La Calatraba / Parc de la Mar

targets.query: SELECT mean("74670") FROM "pm25" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("74808") FROM "pm25" WHERE "74808"<40 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("83137") FROM "pm25" WHERE "83137"<40 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT vessels FROM vessels ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT count("name") FROM "vessels_333"  WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY "type"
SELECT mean("68453") FROM "pm10" WHERE "68453"<100 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("74349") FROM "pm10" WHERE "74349"<45 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

targets.alias: La Calatraba / Parc de la Mar

targets.query: SELECT "rule", "cruisers" FROM "breachs_regulations" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "megacruisers"
